name: Chevron
longDesc: Designed, implemented, tested, and deployed multiple critical in-house business applications. Developed multiple automation tools to improve business efficiency, saving time and money. Provided excellent production support to business partners and new external vendors. Improved organization's project management practices by implementing Scrum framework

name: Chevron
longDesc: Developed a service requesting app on multi-disciplinary team using low-code. Explored testing alternatives and formulated best practices regarding low-code development. Created documentation of recommended best practices to influence future company policy. Improved team's ability to manage projects and increased effectiveness of Agile practices

name: Restoration Robotics, Inc.
longDesc: Researched and compiled an extensive how-to guide for using Microsoft TestHub. Used my guide to transition entire development team into using the new testing framework. Created a tool using Python and TestHub API for automatically generating reports, saving the company time
